data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Nanning, Guangxi, China into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nanning, Guangxi, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Nanning, Guangxi, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Nanning, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,001,800 people living in Nanning, Guangxi, China. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bunuo people.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Nanning who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Jesus, please give your people in Nanning, Guangxi, China a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 75,998 believers in Nanning, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

location.name: Nanning
